             loop: bool = false; ox, oy: Pint = 0) {....raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
tx,ty = top left tilemap coordinates to draw from tw,th = how many tiles to draw across and down dx,dy = position on virtual screen to draw at dw,dh = draw width, draw height, -1 = as big as map ox,oy = offset drawing position, useful for parallax   Source   Edit
